p: Cytokines concentration in 72 h cell culture supernatants was determined by enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA). For interleukin (IL)-10 and interferon (IFN)-γ detection, specific DuoSet ELISA kits were used according to the manufacturer’s instructions (R&D Systems, Minneapolis, MN, United States). For IL-17A detection, rat IL-17A (homodimer) ELISA Ready-SET-Go was used according to the manufacturer’s instructions (eBioscience, San Diego, CA, United States). Samples were analyzed in duplicates and the results were calculated using the standard curves.
